DOC.brief_summary: A clinical study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of MK0633 in patients with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD).
DOC.brief_title: A Research Study of MK0633 in Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)(0633-009)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Documented COPD defined by clinical history and spirometry, with symptoms including dyspnea, wheezing, chest tightness, cough, sputum production, or nocturnal awakening Male or postmenopausal females 40 75 years of age Impaired renal function History of chronic liver disease or persistent liver function test (LFT) abnormalities History of recent cardiovascular clinical event Evidence of another clinically significant, active pulmonary disorder such as bronchiectasis or asthma
